segments.text: I feel a little sad watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task, she doesnâ€™t see the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking so much just for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman is just too tired to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and the boy is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside is just sadness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me feel a little heartbroken.
segments.speaker: PAR
